CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Pilot_Opportunity_Override__c, AND( dateTimestampContractreceived__c >= DATE(2026, 1, 1), IsWon = true, OR( ISPICKVAL(Owner.GTM_Motion_User__c, "Inside Sales"), ISPICKVAL(Owner.GTM_Motion_User__c, "Subscription New Business") ), Winback_Pilot__c = 1 ) ), true, IF( AND( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sales", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sales_Transactional"), not_a_new_customer__c = false, OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract received")) ), true, IF( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Customer_Self_Service", Account.First_Won_Opportunity__c = Id, Account.First_Won_Opportunity__r.not_a_new_customer__c = false ), true, false ) ) )
CustomField.label: Pilot Opportunity
